relating to Comhairle Nan Eilean Siar (Eriskay Causeway).|po1=Comhairle Nan Eilean Siar (Eriskay Causeway) Order 2000|Provisional Order to authorise Comhairle Nan Eilean Siar to construct a causeway for pedestrian and vehicular traffic between the islands of South Uist and Eriskay in na h'Eileanan an Iar; to acquire lands; and for connected purposes.}}
